languages.text: "Как... интересно. Нам тесно здесь, но не так тесно, как в сервиторах. Нужно немного работы над новым вместилищем. И оно будет готово для путешествия вовне".
"How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."
languages.original_text: "Как... интересно. Нам тесно здесь, но не так тесно, как в сервиторах. Нужно немного работы над новым вместилищем. И оно будет готово для путешествия вовне".

traits.locale_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「なんと…興味深い。我々は制限されているように感じるが、サーヴィターの内部ほどではない。新しいシェルには手入れが必要だ。それで、外界へ旅立つ準備が整うだろう」
languages.original_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."

traits.locale_text: 「なんと…興味深い。我々は制限されているように感じるが、サーヴィターの内部ほどではない。新しいシェルには手入れが必要だ。それで、外界へ旅立つ準備が整うだろう」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “真是……太有趣了。我们感觉到了限制，但与在机仆里的时候相比，限制已经少了很多。我们必须对新躯壳进行一部分改动，之后它就可以去外面旅行了。”
languages.original_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."

traits.locale_text: “真是……太有趣了。我们感觉到了限制，但与在奴工里的时候相比，限制已经少了很多。我们必须对新躯壳进行一部分改动，之后它就可以去外面旅行了。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Wie ... interessant. Wir fühlen uns eingeschränkt, doch nicht so sehr wie in Servitoren. An dieser neuen Hülle gibt es einiges zu tun. Dann wird sie bereit für Reisen nach draußen sein."
languages.original_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ... interessant. Wir fühlen uns eingeschränkt, doch nicht so sehr wie in Servitoren. An dieser neuen Hülle gibt es einiges zu tun. Dann wird sie bereit für Reisen nach draußen sein."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Intéressant... Nous nous sentons restreints, mais pas autant que dans les servitors. Nous devons travailler sur cette nouvelle enveloppe avant qu'elle soit prête à s'aventurer à l'extérieur. »
languages.original_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant... Nous nous sentons restreints, mais pas autant que dans les servitors. Nous devons travailler sur cette nouvelle enveloppe avant qu'elle soit prête à s'aventurer à l'extérieur. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Qué... interesante. Nos sentimos restringidos, pero no tanto como dentro de los servidores. Hemos de efectuar algunas modificaciones en el nuevo cascarón. Entonces estará listo para aventurarse al exterior».
languages.original_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."

traits.locale_text: «Qué... interesante. Nos sentimos restringidos, pero no tanto como dentro de los servidores. Hemos de efectuar algunas modificaciones en el nuevo cascarón. Entonces estará listo para aventurarse al exterior».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Çok... İlginç. Kısıtlanmış hissediyoruz ancak hizmetörlerin içindeykenki kadar da kısıtlanmış değiliz. Yeni kabuk üzerinde biraz çalışmamız lazım. Sonrasında dışarıya adım atmaya hazır olacak."
languages.original_text: "How... interesting. We feel restricted, but not as much as inside servitors. Some work must be done on the new shell. Then it will be ready for journeys to the outside."

traits.locale_text: "Çok... İlginç. Kısıtlanmış hissediyoruz ancak hizmetörlerin içindeki kadar da kısıtlanmış değiliz. Yeni kabuk üzerinde biraz çalışmamız lazım. Sonrasında dışarıdaki maceralara hazır olacak."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
